alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Putnam; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:29AM CDT until July 21 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DE KALB...NORTHWESTERN WHITE AND SOUTHWESTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 329 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Baxter, or 9 miles northeast of Smithville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Sparta, Algood, Baxter, Center Hill Lake, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Burgess Falls State Park and Edgar Evans State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 268 and 292. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
